wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{{month|November}}
Events that occurred on 11 November.
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1901]]''' - [[Dorothy Whitelock]], later colleague of Tolkien, is born.
* '''[[1906]]''' - Actor and comedian [[Theodore Isidore Gottlieb]] is born.
* '''[[1918]]''' - [[World War I|The War]] comes to an end in a cease-fire.
* '''[[1919]]''' - The Ministry of Pensions sends a letter to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], on which he wrote a draft of ''[[The Ruined Enchanter|The Ruined Enchanter: A Fairy Ballad]]''.
* '''[[1944]]''' - Actor [[Martyn Read]] is born.
* '''[[1954]] - ''[[The Two Towers]]'' is published.'''
* '''[[1956]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Mr Britten (11 November 1956)|a letter to Mr Britten]].
* '''[[1964]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 265]].
* '''[[1964]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Clyde S. Kilby (11 November 1964)|a letter to Clyde S. Kilby]].
* '''[[1993]]''' - ''[[Poems by J.R.R. Tolkien: Volume I-III|Poems by J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' is published.
* '''[[2003]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit (2003 video game)]]'' is released in the USA.
* '''[[2006]]''' - [[Ring*Con 2006]] in [[wikipedia:Fulda|Fulda]], [[wikipedia:Germany|Germany]].
* '''[[2011]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]'' is released in Spain.
* '''[[2014]]''' - The half-hour documentary ''[[Tolkien's Great War]]'' by Elliot and Zander Weaver is released.<noinclude><ref>{{webcite|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/title/tt5597242/releaseinfo/?ref_=tt_dt_rdat|articlename=Tolkien's Great War - Release info|website=IMDB|accessed=29 November 2025}}</ref></noinclude>

==In Arda==
* {{FA|495}}:
** [[Tuor]], guided by [[Voronwë]], travels to [[Gondolin]] in order to deliver [[Ulmo]]'s message to [[Turgon]].
* {{TA|2994}}:
** A Dwarf (perhaps [[Ori]]) writes in the [[Book of Mazarbul]] about [[Balin]]'s death the previous day.
* {{TA|3018}}:
** {{Cal Preparation-Company}}
** Full moon<noinclude><ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. xlviii</ref>
{{references}}
